sentences.english: The printing part adopts hanging plate roller, which could shorten the time of plate lock-up.
sentences.chinese: 印刷部採用掛版式版輥，可縮短裝版時間。

sentences.english: First, lets separate RSS readers from the format.
sentences.chinese: 首先，把閱讀器和版式分開。

sentences.english: Below is a minimalist typography blog based on Fibonacci Web design.
sentences.chinese: 下圖是基於斐波那契網頁設計的極簡派博客版式。

sentences.english: Layouts based on grids are not appropriate in all cases.
sentences.chinese: 基於柵格的版式設計並非適用於一切案例。

sentences.english: In these formats space is particularly valuable because there’s less of it.
sentences.chinese: 在這種版式中空間就尤顯珍貴，因爲空間愈用愈少。

sentences.english: This section explains how to create a real page format based on the type area.
sentences.chinese: 本部分說明如何以版心作爲基本版式來設計各頁面。

sentences.english: Format both using the template we have stored on the hard disk .
sentences.chinese: 兩種版式都用我們儲存在硬磁盤上的樣版。

sentences.english: But the format design performance is more prominent in the handbill poster notice design.
sentences.chinese: 而在招貼設計中版式設計表現的更爲突出。

sentences.english: His uses of grungy textured backgrounds and typography are unmistakable.
sentences.chinese: 他通常使用邋遢風格的紋理背景和清楚無誤的版式。

sentences.english: Non-standard size of any material or format.
sentences.chinese: 沒有標準規格的材料或版式。

sentences.english: Most common format found on the site is PNG and GIF.
Copy and typography complement each other and give Rochdale an aesthetic voice.
sentences.chinese: 複製和版式相得益彰，給羅奇代爾一種審美的聲音。

sentences.english: This condition of large – format lamp will produce an effect of weightlessness on the cultivated surface.
sentences.chinese: 這種大版式的燈將不會對栽培的土表施加過多的重量。
我真的喜歡那樣的版式。

sentences.english: An unusual format for portfolio of a web design agency.
sentences.chinese: 網站設計商組合的一種很不同尋常的版式。
